channel.title: Removing NPC's
channel.description:
Hey guys, Today I started working on my packaged server, it was going fine until I wanted to remove an NPC. As I would have on all the Deltas I coded, I went to Autospawn.cfg and removed that line. I did that saved and restarted but the NPC is still there, what more do I have to do?
Rep ++ as always for help :D
Thanks

item.title: Removing NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Ironclad722 Ironclad722
item.description:
@Ironclad722 wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

.Cfg does need to be compiled mate…

lolwut. Only .java files need to be compiled. If you ever read a COMPILER, this is what it COMPILES…

@echo off title Compiling... cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./[b]*java[/b] pause

just for further references…

Read full topic

item.title: Removing NPC's
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

thats wierd if its a common npc id like 945 for ex remove every npc with that id thats the only advice i can give because i am not standing in front of your computer right now…

Read full topic

item.title: Removing NPC's
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:6, topic:364758”][quote author=aquikzebra link=topic=460963.msg3372326#msg3372326 date=1287331180]
You don’t need to compile .cfg and also its a packaged server, pur3z317 source
[/quote]

You have compile any file that needs to be updated (e.g Client.Java, TextHandler.Java, etc) Some of the files that which don’t need to be compiled are Ban.Java (Just remove players from being banned) and Mute.Java (Same Thing). Some of the files don’t need to be compiled, though 99% of the files need to be compiled.

In this case Autospawn.Cfg always needs to be compiled once edited.[/quote]

.Cfg doesnt need to be compiled, but I compiled anyways :\ Either way it didnt work …

Read full topic

item.title: Removing NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

You probably had more than 1 exactly the same NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

aquikzebra:

You don’t need to compile .cfg and also its a packaged server, pur3z317 source

You have compile any file that needs to be updated (e.g Client.Java, TextHandler.Java, etc) Some of the files that which don’t need to be compiled are Ban.Java (Just remove players from being banned) and Mute.Java (Same Thing). Some of the files don’t need to be compiled, though 99% of the files need to be compiled.

In this case Autospawn.Cfg always needs to be compiled once edited.

Read full topic
